abstract.text: Declares the app header content for this view.
Displays an image as colored ASCII art in the terminal.
A declarative, SwiftUI-like framework for building Terminal User Interfaces in Swift.
Configures which system items are shown in the status bar.
Sets the maximum allowed pixel count for image loading.
Sets the status bar items for this view with a named context.
Presents this view as a modal dialog over dimmed content.

aspect ratio.
